title: Fast Sum of two to an exponent
text: There is people that really like to do silly thinks, one of them is sum the numbers from 20to 2n, task is actually really simple, just do a ultra fast sum of term 20to 2n.InputThe first line starts with a number, T, which is the number of test cases, T lines will follow.Each line contains the number "n".0 ≤ n ≤ 500OutputOutput the sum from 20to 2nMODULO 1298074214633706835075030044377087.ExampleInput:3012Output:137Extra: TLE is equal to 0.15s
